name.en: Independent Study: Nonlinear and Non-stationary data analysis in Neuroscience
name.ch: 獨立研究：神經科學非線性與非穩態訊號分析

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 建立學生在神經科學上非線性資料分析能力

outline.ch:
"The course focuses on the following topics, each will be discussed throughout the entire semester
1. Empirical mode decomposition and Hilbert-Huang Transformation (EMD/EEMD,and HHT)
2. Multiscale Entropy (MSE)
3. Source Localization"
outline.en:
"The course focuses on the following topics, each will be discussed throughout the entire semester
1. Empirical mode decomposition and Hilbert-Huang Transformation (EMD/EEMD,and HHT)
2. Multiscale Entropy (MSE)
3. Source Localization"

textbook.ch: No specific textbook. The course will be conducted with published papers.
textbook.en: No specific textbook. The course will be conducted with published papers.

flexDiscription.ch: 最後二周為專題實作，由學生自行完成將課堂上習得的研究技術應用於實際的專題上，並將成果以報告之形式繳交
flexDiscription.en: The last two weeks are practical work. Students will apply the research techniques acquired in the classroom to practical projects and submit the results as reports.

domain.ch: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究
domain.en: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
